panels.description: Current number of messages in producer queues
panels.title: msg_cnt

panels.description: Current total size of messages in producer queues
panels.title: msg_size

panels.description: Total number of messages transmitted (produced) to Kafka brokers
panels.title: txmsgs/s

panels.description: Total number of message bytes (including framing, such as per-Message framing and MessageSet/batch framing) transmitted to Kafka brokers
panels.title: txmsg_bytes/s

panels.description: Total number of messages consumed, not including ignored messages (due to offset, etc), from Kafka brokers.
panels.title: rxmsgs/s

panels.description: Total number of message bytes (including framing) received from Kafka brokers
panels.title: rxmsg_bytes/s

panels.description: consumer_lag_stored, difference between (hi_offset or ls_offset) and stored_offset
panels.title: consumer_lag_stored

panels.description: fetchq_cnt: number of pre-fetched messages in fetch queue
panels.title: fetchq_cnt

panels.description: fetchq_size: bytes in fetchq
panels.title: fetchq_size

panels.description: Total number of bytes sent
panels.title: txbytes/s

panels.description: Total number of bytes received
panels.title: rxbytes/s

panels.description: Broker latency / round-trip time in microseconds.
panels.title: rtt_max

panels.description: Total number of requests sent
panels.title: tx/s

panels.description: Total number of responses received
panels.title: rx/s

panels.description: Internal producer queue latency in microseconds.
panels.title: int_latency

panels.description: Number of connection attempts, including successful and failed, and name resolution failures.
panels.title: connects

panels.description: Number of disconnects (triggered by broker, network, load-balancer, etc.).
panels.title: disconnects

panels.description: Internal request queue latency in microseconds. This is the time between a request is enqueued on the transmit (outbuf).
panels.title: outbuf_latency

panels.description: Batch message counts
panels.title: batchcnt

panels.description: Batch sizes in bytes
panels.title: batchsize

panels.description: Total number of messages transmitted (produced)
panels.title: txmsgs/s

panels.description: Total number of bytes transmitted for txmsgs
panels.title: txbytes/s

panels.description: Total number of messages consumed, not including ignored messages (due to offset, etc).
panels.title: rxmsgs/s

panels.description: Total number of bytes received for rxmsgs
panels.title: rxbytes/s
